hero.title: Welcome to BluPresenter
hero.description: Easy present lyrics, share music sheets... Anywhere. Anytime.

free.title: It's free!
free.description: No pricing, no tiering, no credit card information

openSource.title: Open source
openSource.description: We are building it from scratch as an Open Source platform available in <1>GitHub</1>. <3>Learn more</3>

noInstallation.title: No installation required
noInstallation.description: Runs completely on the browser, no need to install any software, app, nor plugin

anywhere.title: Use it anywhere
anywhere.description: You only need an internet connection aaaand... you're in :)

footer.supportMessage: This project is released under the <1>GNU GPL v3.0</1> license and is mantained by donations.<3></3>Consider supporting us by <5>Buying Us a Coffee</5>
